location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Kaye, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing for inspection account disbursements and vouchers (not present) for the Bushire Residency for January 1813. Along with the Quick and Dead Stock (also not present) up to 31 January 1813, and a receipt (again, not present) for the payment of Ali Kaun's [‘Alī Khān] pension.
